basics.name: Diana Bendziula
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer & DevOps
basics.summary: I’m a Full Stack Developer and DevOps Engineer dedicated to crafting solutions that balance sleek front-end experiences with reliable back-end operations. I focus on scalability, maintainability, and clear build pipelines to keep projects running smoothly. I regularly experiment with new tools and open-source tech in my home lab to stay ahead of the curve, and I enjoy collaborating across international teams to share knowledge and refine best practice.

work.name: PARIMEO GmbH
work.description: PARIMEO GmbH is an IT solutions provider specializing in enterprise web development and content management system solutions.
work.summary: Responsible for full-stack development, DevOps automation, server administration and cloud infrastructure management. Worked on in-house solutions and client projects. Also responsible for mentoring junior developers and leading agile development processes.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered as a speaker and mentor at local developer meetups. Topics included DevOps and Cloud Infrastructure, focusing on best practices and lessons learned.
highlights: Delivered talks on modern CI/CD pipelines
Mentored junior developers transitioning to DevOps roles

volunteer.organization: Smart City Project Jena - Hack the paradise!
volunteer.summary: Developed a privacy-compliant solution to measure pedestrian traffic at various city locations. The core codebase showcases a modular data processing pipeline, sensor integration, and real-time analytics—all designed to optimize urban planning, retail strategies, and economic development while maintaining user anonymity.
highlights: Created a prototype for anonymized pedestrian frequency measurement
Implemented real-time data processing and privacy-focused technologies
Achieved second place overall, prompting the city to request further use and research

projects.name: Bundesportal - Onlineverwaltung von Bund & Ländern
projects.description: Contributed to container-based microservices and infrastructure for the official German federal portal, focusing on secure and scalable deployments.
highlights: Engineered automated CI/CD pipelines on an Openshift cluster, reducing deployment times by 40%.
Enhanced system observability and troubleshooting by optimizing logging and monitoring with the ELK Stack, Grafana, and Prometheus.
Collaborated with a cross-functional team to ensure compliance with stringent security and data protection standards, achieving ISO 27001 certification.
Developed microservices architecture that supported over 1 million concurrent users during peak times, ensuring high availability and performance.

projects.name: Calvin Klein - E-Commerce & CMS Integration
projects.entity: PVH Corp. - Calvin Klein & Tommy Hilfiger
projects.description: Developed and maintained cloud-native e-commerce solutions for Calvin Klein & Tommy Hilfiger, integrating CoreMedia CMS with Kubernetes-based deployments.
highlights: Designed and implemented a real-time data pipeline capable of handling high-throughput event streaming, enhancing customer engagement and a stable performance even during peak traffic (Black Friday Sale).
Optimized performance monitoring using Dynatrace and the ELK Stack, resulting in a 30% reduction in response time.
Led the integration of CoreMedia CMS into an existing Kubernetes ecosystem, improving content management efficiency.
Implemented a Content Delivery Network (CDN) strategy that improved global content delivery speed and enhanced user experience.

projects.name: KIKA Mediathek Relaunch & MDR Cloud-Migration
projects.entity: IDA Innovations- und Digitalagentur GmbH for MDR / KIKA
highlights: Implemented a modern DevOps workflow for a live streaming service
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance platform stability
Transitioned the platform to a fully containerized and cloud-based architecture, significantly improving scalability and operational efficiency.
Implemented an effective hybrid cloud strategy, ensuring seamless and highly available content delivery.

projects.name: ePOS DPS – Digitales Pencil Selling
projects.description: Developed and enhanced Telefónica’s ePOS DPS solution to enable swift, paperless customer consultations and contract signings directly at the point of sale. Integrated real-time CRM data so customers and sales staff could collaboratively explore tariffs, promotions, and bundling options on any device, ensuring a transparent experience.
highlights: Implemented an intuitive, touch-optimized interface for quick bundling of complex product offerings
Streamlined the PoS process with real-time CRM data, reducing manual steps and paperwork
Enabled side-by-side customer consultations, fostering transparency and trust
Facilitated an agile rollout by collaborating with pilot store managers and continuously integrating feedback
Mentored team on test-driven development approaches with Playwright and Testcontainers, ensuring robust, maintainable code.

projects.name: In-house Solutions & Client Projects
projects.description: Led the development and deployment of in-house as well as client focused comprehensive IT solutions, specializing in cloud infrastructure and full-stack application development. Applied advanced technologies to develop systems that are scalable, secure, and efficient, effectively addressing a wide range of client requirements. Emphasized the integration of modern DevOps practices to enhance operational efficiency and increase productivity.
highlights: Architected and deployed scalable and cost-efficient cloud solutions on Azure, leveraging Kubernetes for container orchestration to enhance system reliability and scalability.
Developed robust backend services using Spring Boot, integrated with frontend frameworks like React and Angular, to deliver seamless user experiences.
Managed virtualization environments using QEMU and CloudStack, optimizing resource allocation and improving infrastructure cost-efficiency.
Drove architectural decisions and sprint planning in an agile setting, emphasizing knowledge-sharing and best practices.
Trained employees on security best practices, including phishing awareness, password management and incident response, to enhance overall security posture.
Mentoring junior developers on best practices in full-stack development and DevOps methodologies, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
Enhanced network administration and security protocols, ensuring robust protection against threats and maintaining availability of services.
